newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-No decision on Australia, Tenneco says.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-No decision on Australia, Tenneco says.

text.p: Tenneco Inc said on Tuesday it had made no decision about the future of its Australian operations and had not advised anyone that its Australian assets were for sale.

Reacting to remarks by Len Bleasel, managing director of The Australian Gas Light Co, that AGL was interested in acquiring Tenneco's South Australia pipeline, a Tenneco spokeswoman said: "We haven't advised anyone that the pipeline is for sale."
She added: "We haven't made any announcement about what our future structure will be ... this is as if we were saying we're going to buy AGL's pipelines if they'll sell them to us."
She said Tenneco's energy merger with El Paso Energy Corp "in the U.S." context was going ahead in December.
Bleasel had said there was talk in the market that El Paso might not want to hold onto all the Tenneco assets to be acquired.
